name: pumpkin.io
description:
Outsmart yourself and your friends in this wildly chaotic, yet strategic time-looping party game!

Welcome to Pumpkin! Work with yourself and your friends against your evil clones across a variety of maps ranging in difficulty, from the simple, to the downright insane. Can you handle the chaos?

How to play

Pumpkin takes place in a time-loop.
Each round, players need to successfully reach their goal before time runs out.

When a player reaches their goal, an evil clone of them will take their place.
Evil clones repeat the exact same actions of the player they replaced, including their exact movements. You must avoid them at all costs!

With every round, more and more evil clones of you and your friends will appear.
Earn points by overcoming the odds and completing rounds quickly!

Game modes

Pumpkin features some awesome extra game modes to spice up your experience:

  • Freeze Tag - The name says it all. Gain points by tagging your friends, or staying near the tagger!
Features
  • Fast-paced multiplayer action with up to 8 players. Strategize with your friends!
  • Full-featured singleplayer mode, with leaderboards for each map. Can you outsmart yourself?
  • 12 carefully handcrafted levels, all with chaos in mind. Many more to come!
  • Create your own custom maps with the built-in map editor and share them with your friends!
  • Save and watch all your replays!
